name: SubmitApplicationFeedback
description:
Submit application feedback forms with various field types.

This tool allows you to submit application feedback forms supporting multiple field types such as boolean, date, email, number, text, score, phone, and select options. It requires the `candidatesWrite` permission and returns the submitted feedback with the field paths and values.

parameters.name: feedback_form_data
parameters.description: The JSON object containing key-value pairs for feedback submission fields. Field types include Boolean, Date, Email, Number, PlainText, Score, Phone, String, ValueSelect, and MultiValueSelect. Format and match the content accordingly for each type.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
